text.section: This subtitle applies to contracts subject to Title 17, Subtitle 1 of the State Finance and Procurement Article, known as the "Maryland Little Miller Act", as well as property subject to § 9-102 of this title.

This subtitle does not apply to:
A contract for the construction and sale of a single family residential dwelling; or
A home improvement contract by a contractor licensed under the Maryland Home Improvement Law.
In this subtitle, "owner", "contractor", and "subcontractor" have the same meanings as in § 9-101 of this title.
